question: The book "Tabaqat-i-Nasiri" written by whom?
explanation: The Persian historian, Minhaj-i-Siraj composed Tabaqat-i-Nasiri, which accounts the historical events of the Islamic world from the days Adam to the year 1260 AD (when it was completed). This political history is written in Persian language for Sultan  Nasir ud din Mahmud (1246–1266 AD), the slave dynasty ruler.
